name: Share Dealing UI
lead:
While a part of the Design Office team working on a new discretionary investment platform I was responsible for the UX component of several work packages. This example shows annotated UI design for Agent Dealing within the Order Management & Execution work package.

The approaches utilised in reaching this stage included using existing knowledge of the share dealing business at Barclays, review of the business and functional requirements documents, development of a relationship with the external agency that created the UI style guide and InDesign documentation framework, collaborative design and review with the work package team.
